mapper.sql: user_id, username, password, salt, user_email, user_phone, user_image, user_status, deleted, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT t2.role_name FROM sys_user_role t1,sys_role t2 WHERE t2.role_id = t1.role_id AND t1.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT t1.permission FROM sys_resource t1, sys_role_resource t2, sys_user_role t3 WHERE t1.permission IS NOT NULL AND t1.resource_id = t2.resource_id AND t2.role_id = t3.role_id AND t3.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT distinct t1.resource_id, t1.parent_id, t1.resource_name, t1.url, t1.icon FROM sys_resource t1, sys_role_resource t2, sys_user_role t3 WHERE t1.resource_id = t2.resource_id AND t2.role_id = t3.role_id AND t1.type != 2 AND t3.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY order_num ASC
SELECT distinct t1.resource_id, t1.parent_id, t1.resource_name, t1.url, t1.icon FROM sys_resource t1 ORDER BY order_num ASC
